entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 11:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.7°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers or periods of drizzle. Fog patches. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near midnight. Periods of freezing rain inland overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 1 except minus 2 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023
